Module for managing RSS feeds in the guild.

InteractiveService serv

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

FeedAdd(string, ITextChannel?)

Adds a new RSS feed to the guild's feed list.

Declaration
[Cmd("FeedAdd")]
[Aliases("FeedAdd")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task FeedAdd(string url, ITextChannel? channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string url

The URL of the RSS feed.
ITextChannel channel

The channel where feed updates will be sent (optional, defaults to the current channel).
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command adds a new RSS feed to the guild's feed list. It requires the Manage Messages permission in the guild.

Examples
.feedadd https://example.com/feed
| Edit this page View Source

FeedList()

Lists all RSS feeds added to the guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("FeedList")]
[Aliases("FeedList")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task FeedList()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command lists all RSS feeds added to the guild. It requires the Manage Messages permission in the guild.

Examples
.feedlist
| Edit this page View Source

FeedMessage(int, string)

Sets a custom message format for feed updates in a specific channel.

Declaration
[Cmd("FeedMessage")]
[Aliases("FeedMessage")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task FeedMessage(int index, string message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The index of the feed in the list.
string message

The custom message format.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command sets a custom message format for feed updates in a specific channel. It requires the Manage Messages permission in the guild.

Examples
.feedmessage 1 New feed update: %title%
| Edit this page View Source

FeedRemove(int)

Removes an RSS feed from the guild's feed list.

Declaration
[Cmd("FeedRemove")]
[Aliases("FeedRemove")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task FeedRemove(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The index of the feed in the list.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command removes an RSS feed from the guild's feed list. It requires the Manage Messages permission in the guild.

Examples
.feedremove 1

RssTest(int)

Tests the retrieval of an RSS feed to check for updates.

Declaration
[Cmd("RssTest")]
[Aliases("RssTest")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task RssTest(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The index of the feed in the list.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command tests the retrieval of an RSS feed to check for updates. It requires the Manage Messages permission in the guild.

Examples
.rsstest 1
